name: Between Dreams (FortySix)
description:
THIS GAME IS SUPPOSED TO BE PLAYED IN FULLSCREEN MODE.

DOWNLOAD THE GAME FOR A BETTER (AUDIO) EXPERIENCE.

A short 2D platformer in which you have to escape from your dreams to wake up again. Someone or something also seems to help you.

You have to jump through black/white/red worlds and reach the entrance to reality. 

Game and music made by FortySix

Controls:

Move = AD

Jump = Space

Pause (Standalone only) = ESC

Menu = M

Known problems/inconveniences, might be fixed in future update:

  • Slightly glitched audio at the beginning
